meanings.definition: Not involving or relating to game animals.
meanings.sent1: The nature reserve focuses on protecting nongame species like butterflies and frogs.
meanings.sent2: The zoo's nongame exhibit features various bird species.
meanings.sent3: At the wildlife sanctuary, even the nongame creatures get their own special area.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the nongame animals roam freely away from hunting grounds.
meanings.sent5: The nongame wildlife flourishes in the untouched wilderness.

meanings.definition: A person who does not play games.
meanings.sent1: As a nongame, she preferred reading books over playing sports.
meanings.sent2: The group of nongames gathered for a movie night instead of a game tournament.
meanings.sent3: The nongame in the group always had the best movie recommendations.
meanings.sent4: He was known as the nongame of the office, always focused on work rather than games.
meanings.sent5: The nongame student excelled in academics and leadership roles.
